increments.label: Cash increments
increments.text: Daily series of net cash ≈ margin on sales + payments + banking flows.

model.label: Model
model.text: AR(1) on increments (μ, φ, σ estimated) → 3k–8k simulated paths over 30–180 days.

fan.label: Fan chart
fan.text: Curves represent quantiles p5, p50 (median), p95 of simulated paths.

cfar.label: CFaR / ES
cfar.text: Cash-flow-at-Risk and Expected Shortfall at quantile α: potential losses on ΔCash at horizon.

prob.label: Prob(Overdraft)
prob.text: Share of trajectories that fall below €0 at least once before the horizon.

runway.label: Runway P5
runway.text: 5th-percentile of days before €0 (if no trajectory crosses 0 → ∞).

hhi.label: Client HHI
hhi.text: Concentration index on client sales shares (0 = diversified, >0.2 = high).

stress.label: Stress tests
stress.text: Δ% sales (scaling), Δ% costs (margin impact), +DSO days (delay in payments).
